stories.headline: Get set for 2003 CAR Conference
stories.summary: Overview of the upcoming Annual Computer-Assisted Reporting Conference, highlighting panels, workshops, and training sessions planned for Charlotte, N.C.

stories.headline: Databases show implant troubles
stories.summary: Investigation into medical implants using FDA data, highlighting issues with regulatory systems and the scope of implant failures.

stories.headline: Digging into health, medicine
stories.summary: Exploration of databases related to medicine and health for investigative reporting, with a focus on medical errors and patient safety.

stories.headline: Open Source: Free, but worth the cost?
stories.author_title: NICAR and Missouri School of Journalism
stories.summary: Evaluation of free open-source software packages for journalism, with insights on utility and performance for computer-assisted reporting.
